Label: (LOC_OS04G56710.1)
Comment: Facilitates the conversion of GTP to 7,8-dihydroneopterin 3'-triphosphate.

Label: synthase
Comment: Facilitates the combination of p-aminobenzoate and 2-amino-4-hydroxy-6-hydroxymethyl-7,8-dihydropteridine diphosphate to form 7,8-dihydropteroate.

Label: reductase
Comment: Facilitates the conversion of 7,8-dihydrofolate to tetrahydrofolate.

Label: aldolase
Comment: Facilitates the conversion of dihydro-neo-pterin to 6-hydroxymethyl-dihydropterin.

Label: formyltransferase
Comment: Facilitates the conversion of N10-formyl-THF to tetrahydrofolate.

Label: diphosphokinase
Comment: Facilitates the conversion of 6-hydroxymethyl-dihydropterin to 2-amino-4-hydroxy-6-hydroxymethyl-7,8-dihydropteridine diphosphate.
